details: Learn Python programming from scratch. Covers Python fundamentals, data structures, and more.
Master the basics of JavaScript programming. Includes DOM manipulation and ES6 features.
Comprehensive Java course covering object-oriented programming and Java development.
Learn C++ programming with a focus on data structures and algorithms.
Become a Ruby on Rails developer. Covers MVC architecture and web application development.
Fundamental web development skills with HTML and CSS. Create static web pages.
Build dynamic web applications with PHP. Learn about databases and server-side scripting.
Develop iOS and macOS apps with Swift. Covers iOS app development fundamentals.
Master SQL for managing relational databases. Learn about queries, indexing, and more.
